artefact.localhost.mac.file.ShellHistory.title: ShellHistoryOffAllUsers
artefact.localhost.mac.file.ShellHistory.description: Retrieves all user folers and tries to find bash shell and zhs shell history files and\r\n then tries to store their content.\r\n IMPORTANT: None-Unicode-Characters wont be stored.

artefact.localhost.mac.system.NVRAMColle.title: NVRAMCollector
artefact.localhost.mac.system.NVRAMColle.description: Collects the contents of the NVRAM by calling the bash command "nvram"

artefact.localhost.user.CurrentUser.title: CurrentUser
artefact.localhost.user.CurrentUser.description: Collects the current user with the Python module getpass.
